original_title: How to microwave a cauliflower (in 3 easy steps)
overview: You first need to film the cauliflower three times, with a red, green and blue filter in turn. After 30 seconds make sure to pull focus on two of these takes, but not the third (choose your colours to taste). Shooting should be done through a spinning aperture for no more than 90 seconds. Combine in a computer.
title: How to microwave a cauliflower (in 3 easy steps)
